timeline.message:
Fortune cookies

a few more quotes for fortune cookies

timeline.bodyText: You need to "escape" the single quote. So, do '' (two back to back)
timeline.author: WalshyDev
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,6 +155,12 @@ messages:
   - '&742. The answer is 42.'
   - '&7A Walshy a day will keep the troubles away.'
   - '&7Never dig straight down!'
+  - '&7Tis but a flesh wound!'
+  - '&7I'm &4NOT &7the Messiah!'
